content.div:
Tie your hair back in a braid, adjust your mockingjay pin and prepare yourself for some child-on-child bloodshed: the Hunger Games movie is finally upon us.

Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth and the rest of the cast walked the red carpet Monday night at the film's official premiere at L.A.'s Nokia Theatre. But you didn't need a 90210 zip code to watch all the action. Just tune in below to the livestream recap.

After checking out the red carpet coverage, don't forget to check out our Hunger Games primer, photos from the mall tour, and the latest soundtrack news.


Live broadcast by Ustream

entry.title: Photos: Hunger Games Primer

link.Abstract: Consult this handy cheat sheet to brush up on your Hunger Games knowledge.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: The Hunger Games movie is about to hit, and it's poised to make the Twilight phenomenon look like a box office blip. But what if you don't know your Panem from your Primrose, and can't tell the difference between a jabberjay and a tracker jacker? Don't worry, we've got you covered. Consult this handy cheat sheet and brush up on your HG trivia before the film is released. -Jen McDonnell/Dose.ca
link.Credit: The Hunger Games: Official Illustrated Movie Companion

link.Abstract: If we learned one thing from Liam Hemsworth's Details interview, it's that the dude is easily distracted by squirrels. Funny, we're easily distracted by Liam Hemsworth. But who's cuter?! We're pretty sure we know how the Hunger Games star will be voting, but we'll let you decide. For each slide, cast your vote!
link.title: Who's Cuter: Liam Hemsworth or a Squirrel?

link.title: 2012 Grammy Awards - Best and Worst Moments

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift plays Stevie Nicks dress-up for the February issue of Vogue. Check out photos of the country-pop star shot by Mario Testino.
link.title: Photos: Taylor Swift Turns Vogue Cover Girl

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift's Speak Now World Tour is at its end. The country-pop star gave the first of two sold-out shows at New York's Madison Square Garden Nov. 21. We've got photos.
link.title: Photos: Taylor Swift at Madison Square Garden

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift has many faces, but they all look surprised.
link.title: Photos: Taylor Swift Looking Surprised

link.Abstract: Watch Taylor Swift's new video for "Ours," wherein everyone's favourite country-pop star plays an office drone. The work world, much like any Swift video, is a lot like high school.
link.title: Zach Gilford, Cat Videos Help Taylor Swift Make it Through the Work Day; She's Just Like Us!

link.Abstract: How can you dump someone if nobody knows you're dating? Only Taylor Swift and Eddie Redmayne know the answer.
link.title: Taylor Swift Reportedly Dumped By Dude She Probably Wasn't Dating

link.Abstract: Hot Chelle Rae's Ryan Follese and Nash Overstreet don't mind doing it for the kids. The "Tonight Tonight" hitmakers dish on why having a super-loyal fanbase is so not, like, Whatever.
link.title: Interview: Hot Chelle Rae

link.Abstract: Adele will play the BRIT Awards on Feb. 21, buoying hopes that the "Someone Like You" singer might also perform at the Grammy Awards Feb. 12.
link.title: Adele Making Comeback at BRIT Awards; Will She Be Well Enough for a Grammy Gig, Too?
